CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 12, 1945, pg. 21, reads: "Concert Principals - Pittsburgh will get a taste of the trend toward popular music concerts when Lionel Hampton's Orchestra and Marva Louis appear at the Syria Mosque on Monday, June 4. Seated at the table are members of the planning committee of the Centre Avenue YMCA, sponsor of the concert.  Left to right: Miss Thelma Burgess, secretary; William G. Nunn, managing editor of The Courier, adviser; Mrs. Juanita Page, business secretary, and C. Sterling Chavis, executive secretary of the YMCA.  Drum beater for the concert are standing ready to go to work  to make the affair a great success. Center Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of members of Centre Avenue YMCA planning committee, seated from left: Thelma Burgess, William G. Nunn, Juanita Page, C. Sterling Chavis, and other men standing in background, in Centre Avenue YMCA with Henry O. Tanner painting "Christ and His Mother"
